:::

Modality scheduling overview. For each language, each subject (T$_i$) works with a pseudo-random sequence of modalities (HT, PE$_1$, PE$_2$). For the warm-up task (*N*=5), all translators are provided with the same documents in the same modalities. For the main task (*N*=107), each translator is assigned a modality at random. Each document is translated once for every modality. The same procedure is repeated independently for all the languages.
:::
